# skipDescendants()

**Instance Method**

Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.

## Declaration

```swift
func skipDescendants()
```

## Discussion

This method is identical to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager/DirectoryEnumerator/skipDescendents()] except for the spelling.

## Skipping Subdirectories

- **skipDescendents()**: Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.
